title: The Grief Episode - Featuring Dr. Tykeia Robinson
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we discuss our relationship to grief, society not being designed to hold space for us as we grieve, and how we show up for ourselves (and others) during hard times. Featuring our sister, Dr. Tykeia Robinson, of the Gettin' Grown Podcast. 

Black Business of the Week - https://www.instagram.com/fwfnyc

THE FRIEND ZONE IS ON PATREON! Sign up now to catch our 4 spin-off shows (with audio AND video) plus our NEW Livestream Tour: www.patreon.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Thank you to our Sponsors:
Amazon's Emergency - It's about three college kids whose legendary night of partying is interrupted when they find a drunk, passed out stranger in their apartment. EMERGENCY is NOW PLAYING in Select Theaters and streaming on Amazon Prime Video May 27th.

Have a GREAT day!
